text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts draw closer. One day,<n>during a trip to the
shopping district, I<n>hear a familiar voice.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Carrots! Get your carrots here!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, long time no see! Hehe, I'm<n>helping the carrot farmer
sell his<n>stock!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: He opens a stall here in the localfarmer market every once in a while,but he's got a ton of leftoversthis time.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
We can sell these if we put our minds<n>to it, though! Who
wouldn't want a<n>tasty carrot?

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate the thought, Urara, but<n>that's enough. It's my
own darn fault<n>for bringing so many carrots.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
It'll be fine! We just gotta get<n>people's attention, and those
carrots<n>will fly off the cart! Carrots! Get your<n>carrots here!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even when faced with a literal<n>mountain of unsold carrots,
Haru<n>Urara's determined cries never<n>waver.

text_block_list.name: Fish Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit, Urara! Come on,<n>folks, we can't let her
have ALL the<n>fun!

text_block_list.name: Vegetable Seller
text_block_list.text:
In that case... Come and get it! I'll<n>offer a deal on onions
and potatoes to<n>anyone buying carrots! Perfect for<n>curry
or stew!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before long, the shopping district is<n>abuzz with activity, all
thanks to Haru<n>Urara.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Woohoo, all the carrots are gone!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
Who would've thought I'd sell every<n>last carrot... I couldn't
have asked for<n>more. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
No problem! I'm just glad I could tell<n>people how tasty your
carrots are!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Th-there you are!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah, King! Sorry, but the carrots are all<n>gone.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh, phooey! I'm late to the party...<n>not! Aren't you
forgetting something?<n>You should be training right now!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, my bad, but the carrot farmer<n>was in trouble! I
couldn't just ignore<n>him.

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
Don't be too mad at her, miss. Our<n>little Urara here was
busy teaching me<n>a very important lesson—

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text: To never give up, no matter what.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah! And I couldn't let those carrots<n>go to waste!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I-I haven't the slightest idea what<n>you're going on about...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Sigh... At least you had a reasonfor skipping training.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
However! You shouldn't disappear<n>without a word like that
though! Do<n>you know how worried Special Week<n>was?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: What?! Then I better go apologize to<n>her right away!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait!

text_block_list.name: Fish Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
Bahaha! Always bursting with<n>energy, that one. At this rate,
her<n>dream of finishing first isn't far off<n>from coming true!
choice_data_list: Taking first place is her dream?
Taking first place is her dream?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you didn't know? Haru Urara has<n>never finished first
place, even in<n>training or the scrimmages.

text_block_list.name: Fish Stall Owner
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but she never gives up or even<n>gets discouraged. She
just keeps<n>running with a smile on her face.<n>Amazing,
right?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
As long as she keeps her head up,<n>she still has a chance. Of
course, an<n>invincible racer like me has no such<n>worries.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thinking back, I recall Haru Urara<n>mentioning first place a
few times, but<n>who would've thought it was such a<n>big
issue for her?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps the reason I find her so<n>compelling... is that
steadfast<n>dedication to achieving her dream.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho—H-hold on, don't ignore me!<n>I demand my due
respect!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Phew... Let's do the dirt course next.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you again!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Well, the tryouts aren't far off! I really<n>gotta kick it into gear
if I wanna take<n>first place!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I wonder what winningfeels like...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I mean, running on its own is already<n>so fun. If I take first
place, I bet I'd be<n>doing backflips!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Well, yeah! I am an Umamusume,after all! I love running, but I want towin too!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
And as long as I keep up my training,<n>I'm sure I'll take first
place someday!<n>I won't give up!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: So I better get back to it! Up next is...<n>the dirt course!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara's sunny outlook<n>continues to shine on despite
her track<n>record.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She comes off as a little naive, but at<n>the same time... I can't
help but want<n>to see her win.
choice_data_list: Want me to help you train?
Want me to help you train?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Really?! Could you?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, to be honest, I don't really<n>know if I'm doing this
whole training<n>thing right, so having you here will be<n>a big
help!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: All right, just you watch! I'll show<n>you what I've got!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I quietly observe Haru Urara's<n>practice, my calling as a
trainer is even<n>more compelled to help this dreamer<n>reach
her goal.
